author: fielding
msg: clarify that either authority or host could be empty

author: fielding
msg: Clarify use of the character encoding terms. [Martin Duerst]
Clarify that reg-name need not refer to an Internet host and move
that up to the first paragraph to avoid invalid partial-readings.

author: fielding
msg: clarify the purpose and use of fragment

author: fielding
msg: Try to resolve confusion over URI character encoding by separating
out the discussion of identifying data into a new section and
specifically noting the different encodings involved in URI production.
Also, consistently refer to percent-encoding within section titles.
